text:
[00:00:00.110] speaker 0:
The topics language skill takes a body of text, whether they are news reports, articles, emails, or conversations, and extracts a set of relevant topics. Place your text here. Next, drag the topic skill to the pipeline. Now run the pipeline. The extracted topics will appear in the output box to the right above your text. They're also listed at the bottom. The generated code appears in the box on the bottom left in the framework of your choice. Copy it here and paste it into your project.
